name: Cantina Rooftop
address: 605 W 48th St, New York, NY 10019, USA

reviews.text: Our waiter Carlos was Amazing!!!
Our waiter Carlos was amazing. Amazing food and service

AMAZING!!!!!? You will not regret going here! Me & my friends were at a party nearby, but it was pretty dead, so we decided to go here instead! It was everything that we wanted! Good food, good drinks, and people dancing and having a good time!!! We went to celebrate my friend's birthday and had such a great time!

Love coming to cantina for the vibes but today (11/1) was the WORST service I have ever had here. We arrived and ordered a pitcher as a group of 5. Not even ten seconds into taking a sip, Maria asks if we want to order another pitcher. We tell her that we wanted to wait a while since we are still drinking and there‚Äôs some drinks left in the pitcher. Not even 15 minutes after, she hands me the check. Incredibly rude when we told her we were going to order another round and told us that our time was up. MIND YOU we spent no more than 20 minutes here before the check arrived. Really disappointing especially considering the 20% auto gratuity added to the check.
Amazing atmosphere! Staff and Raphael were full of fun and joy.  Awesome energy.  This is where you go when you wanna wake up your soul to music, food and dance.  Bravo
Good food, very friendly and fun staff. Party atmosphere, great if you're looking for that

The food was ok. I got the carnita tacos and the chicharr√≥n they use if the one that comes in the bag. My boyfriend got birria and that was just a little better. I find it really pricey for the food the drinks weren‚Äôt all that either. The decorations were really cool is the only thing I find super cool. I also felt uncomfortable because I felt like I was been observed all the time by almost the entire staff. Every time
I looked somewhere a staff looking at my table so we ended up leaving and going to a bar when the plan was to stay there longer and continue drinking but in between the drink not tasting good and being pricey and staff watching we decided to leave.
Muy bien ambiente
Una muy buena experiencia, excelente servicio.
had fun in
Definitely very good service and good quality food
Love the vibes, worth visiting. Music is 10 out of 10.
Great service
Best food and drinks, good service by michael!
Super nice staff. Michael was super nice!
Muy buen servicio para mi cumplea√±os ü•≥
Atmosphere & vibe was great ! Drinks and food were really great as well ! Everyone was so nice !
Vibes are always amazing, staff is super friendly and food is great always !
Amazing welcoming environment, food and atmosphere 10/10. Recommend to anyone
This place is so amazing. Michael was sooo sweet!! And so was everyone else!! ‚ù§Ô∏è I‚Äôll def be coming back!
Love it here, and Michael is great!
Carlos was amazing highly recommended!
Great staff very friendly
The place to be on a Friday night
Michaellllllll. Like Michael Jordan lmao.  He is awesome lol
Cata was really nice
Excellent service and great atmosphere
Very good customer service shout out Jordan and Cata would definitely come again food was amazing drinks as well
Great vibes and great service will recommend! Micheal was amazing
Great food and great vibes. Shoutout Michael for the great hospitality
Food was okay, very friendly service‚Äî we were there to celebrate a friend‚Äôs birthday. The manager was nice enough to offer free shots!

Overall a great vibe good food good drinks! The manager Raphael was AMAZING!!! The Halloween vibes outta this world. Go for brunch or dinner the DJ was great. Guaranteed to make you get outta seat and dance!!! I came on Saturday 10/18 and then again on 10/26 just great overall
Rafael was amazing. The music and vibes were great!
5 stars. We went here after an earlier activity and it was amazing. Food was great! the waiter was funny. Our food came so fast. The place was beautiful.
Had the best waitress she was so sweet and fun‚Ä¶ I recommend this place to anybody
Great atmosphere, taco and margaritas
Martha was a great waitress! The atmosphere and food was excellent! Definitely coming back. Thank you!
Get the Brussel sprouts! They‚Äôre super addicting. Our waiter Martha was great, super attentive and has great recommendations. Habanero Margarita is a must if you come here.

I went here after a concert they asked if we had a reservation and we did not but they accommodated us, the food was great but the place was super loud . A little expensive but for Manhattan it was expected Other than that it was great
Great place, amazing service.  Waiter Adalbarto was great.

In meinen Augen lohnt sich dieses Restaurant nicht.

Durch Instagram sind wir auf dieses Restaurant aufmerksam geworden und haben da wir zurzeit in New York sind, diesem Mal einen Besuch abgestattet.

Reservierung online verlief reibungslos. Bei Ankunft von einer netten jungen Dame in Empfang genommen worden.
Oben auf dem Rooftop angekommen von einer weiteren netten Dame zum Tisch gef√ºhrt worden.

Bestellung und Getr√§nke wurden ebenfalls z√ºgig und freundlich aufgenommen.
So weit so gut, dass Ambiente und die anf√§ngliche Freundlichkeit sind leider das einzige was ich positiv bewerten kann.

Angefangen bei meiner Diet Coke - die sowohl vom Geruch als auch vom Geschmack eher an Abwasser erinnert hat.
Da wir kein Koriander m√∂gen, haben wir die "All you can eat Tacos" ohne eben diesen bestellt - das Resultat ist das Brot, Fleisch und Zwiebeln, kein weiteres Gem√ºse (am Nachbartisch waren anscheinend noch Tomaten etc. mit auf den Tacos) - anscheinend gibt es hier nicht die M√∂glichkeit, normale Tacos ohne Koriander zu bekommen. Wir haben zu zweit 5 Tacos gegessen, die aufgrund des fehlenden Gem√ºses super trocken waren und uns schlichtweg nicht geschmeckt haben. Dies haben wir der Bedienung mitgeteilt und gehofft man kommt uns etwas entgegen und hat Verst√§ndnis daf√ºr.
Als die Rechnung kam, wusste ich nicht was ich sagen soll - man hat uns f√ºr 5 kleine Tacos, eine untrinkbare Diet Coke und ein Ginger Ale √ºber 60$ berechnet - plus Tax und 20% Automatisch berechneten Tip ( was eine absolute Frechheit ist f√ºr den "Service" den wir erfahren durften, nachdem wir der Bedienung mitgeteilt haben das uns das Essen so nicht schmeckt).
Unterm Strich, ca 80$ - dazu fehlen mir immernoch die Worte....
Habe der Bedienung einen 100$ Schein gegeben und sie meinte sie ist gleich wieder da, 10min sp√§ter kommt sie wieder und gibt mir allen Ernstes 20 1$ Scheine als Wechselgeld.

Alles in Allem f√ºr uns in 1 Woche NYC das mit Abstand schlechteste Erlebnis √ºberhaupt. Mag sein, dass Leute die mit Koriander kein Problem haben hier ihren Spa√ü haben k√∂nnen aber jedem der nicht gerne (VIEL) Koriander auf seinen Tacos haben m√∂chte, rate ich mehr als dringend davon ab, hier die Tacos essen zu wollen!!
Michael is amazing!! Food is amazing, taco Tuesday honestly best
Me encant√≥ , la atenci√≥n , la comida s√∫per
The place was amazing, the vibes were immaculate, I had a great time. Michael was great host!
I celebrated my friend‚Äôs 30th birthday. The service was fantastic! Michael was a great host!

Micheal and Maria were great! Helped us celebrate a families birthday with an amazing atmosphere and fun. Recommend coming here for a great time, music, and food. They live up to every expectation and go above and beyond.

Came all the way from Massachusetts for this amazing service! Micheal was amazing and the whole staff helped to create a wonderful environment for our lunch. 11/10 restaurant, would definitely recommend.
Awesome food, great atmosphere, Michael is great!
Such a friendly place! Michael was wonderful and the food was delicious!
Amazing place with even more amazing people!!

Buen ambiente, buena atenci√≥n por parte de nuestro mesero Elvis sin duda fue lo mejor pues llegamos al lugar por una promoci√≥n de fiesta brunch. La misma decia que teniamos bottomless mimosas y un entree por $38. para esto deben saber que el "bottomless" se trata de solo una botella prehecha de prosseco con naranja (no hay mas opciones de sabores) y un entree del menu de brunch, no hubo fiesta mientras estuvimos aunque cabe recalcar que la musica estaba buena todo el tiempo, solo que al parecer llegamos temprano. Aun con lo dicho fue una buena experiencia! si piensan q ir no duden en preguntar por Elvis como su mesero si quieren tener un servicio eficiente y amable.

Went here because of an IG post raving about the all you can eat taco Tuesday for $25.. in the ad there were ten different tacos available to choose from.
Got here only to find out that the offerings whittled down to four! Steak, chicken, cheese and pork of which as a mostly plant based person I eat none of those. My husband had the chicken and steak but we had to speak to the kind manager Mike who was happy to accommodate me after we brought the issue to his attention. I was able to get the fish and impossible tacos, but it wasn't all I could eat unfortunately. The fish was spicy but good. The impossible tasted like it was a sweet corn taco. I don't recommend it. The chicken and steak were good according to my husband but in all honesty, unless you're looking to explore more of the menu and drink the alcoholic drinks (we didn't) and are in a party vibe don't rush to get here, if at all. We've had better from the neighborhood spot.

Great vibe, amazing food. Service was less than stellar. Took a few requests to get served and after asking for our bill 5 times, we just went up to the front and paid. Maybe just a bad night.

Update: Went back for a second time and it was amazing. Service was spot on. Manager was great and stopped to chat. Gave us recommendations to another bar. Gotta love loud music though.

Loved the Guac. Enchiladas were amazing. We got cocktails in the skulls and got to take the skulls home!

‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è A Trip to Mexico on a Rooftop! (We Didn't Want to Leave!)
Cantina Rooftop is an absolute must-visit! The experience starts before you even get through the door‚ÄîI could hear the DJ's bass thumping while waiting for the elevator, which set the tone for the entire night.
The vibe is pure vacation: energetic, colorful, and just plain fun. Honestly, we felt like we'd stepped off a plane and landed in a lively spot in Mexico! The atmosphere is so infectious, thanks in large part to the amazing DJ keeping the energy high. We genuinely did not want to leave.
But let's talk about the food. Every single thing we tried was delicious! We started with the nachos, which were perfectly loaded and craveable, and the tostadas were fresh, crunchy, and spot-on. The true star of the show, however, were the Birria tacos. Seriously, do not skip these! The meat was tender, rich, and perfect for dipping.Cantina Rooftop has nailed the trifecta: fantastic food, great drinks, and an unbeatable, party-like atmosphere. It‚Äôs the perfect place for a celebration, a date night, or just when you need a little escape. Go! You won't regret it.

First time here at cantina rooftop was exceptional! Met with my great friend to catch up and it was a perfect setting- weather, music and excellent hospitable service! Waiter was welcoming and besieged we enjoyed our food and drinks. Michael worked the room and greeted diners with smiles and great energy. We enjoyed the shark, cow and dinosaur who danced for the diners. Definitely worth visiting after work, for birthday celebrations of just to visit! Espect√°cular y excepcionalmente bueno! Gracias!!!

My friend and I went to the rooftop for the Taco Tuesday deal. The staff are welcoming and checks up on you regularly throughout. The drinks were strong but still good. There were also photographers taking photos (with consent) and offering a frame with it too ($$). We were excited to eat the tacos and see the city views, but it turned out we couldn‚Äôt see the views. The tacos were hit or miss and it did take longer than normal to get them.

Talk about excellence!!! Atmosphere was so hip, live dj was playing great music. The food was phenomenal. Every bite had flavor. Portion sizes were pretty large. Definitely a must if you're in the area!!

Went for dinner through reservation; would definitely recommend getting reservation because it's super easy to reserve a spot online.

Atmosphere is big. Music is super loud and its hard to hear your own voice. It was nearly impossible to chat while eating, and we weren't even placed close to the DJ. The rooftop doesn't have a good view. It's not really my vibe, but maybe its up to personal preference.

Service was ok. Even though it was super busy, servers were attentive and checked in occasionally! There was an automatic 20% gratuity charge.

Food was also ok. Went during Taco Tuesday for the $25 AYCE tacos deal, but was a little disappointed because they took a bunch of tacos off the menu (there was only pork/beef/chicken/cheese). Cheese was the best by far; sweet and savory, though I wish the cheese was more melty. Pork was also good. Beef and chicken were bland and not really worth it. Wish they had cheese or sauce or something on them. For the AYCE deal, its not bad, but I wouldn't pay regular prices for these tacos.

Overall, it isn't really worth going here; there are better tacos and better music elsewhere.

We went to celebrate a birthday, the vibe is really nice, really good music and the food is amazing! Really good sizes and very tasty. The waiters take a little to come back to you, and it is just because its crazy busy place.

The vibe was everything.  Felt welcome from moment one stepped off elevator. Manager was attentive, birthday celebrations all around were so cute.my server was the besttttttttttt adalberto was always with us and kept checking in us.  Filling our drinks (unlimited within 90 mins)   Thank you sweetie. You‚Äôre the best !!!!

The atmosphere is fun!!  Service is very slow and took forever for us to get a hold of our wait staff, if we needed something.

Food is OK.  They have a brunch menu and during "brunch/ lunch" they do not offer regular burritos etc.  most dishes at that time are breakfast focused and include eggs.

Food taste is OK.  Eaten better Mexican food!

Pricey.
Elvis was an amazing server and Michael the manager was extremely accommodating and personable! The food was a little under seasoned but overall amazing! Go here and ask for Michael and Elvis!

Michael and his staff‚Äîespecially Rafael‚Äîare everything! So attentive, so handsome, and truly the life of the party. You can tell they love what they do. Rafael needs to be the official dancer there fr üò≠üíÉ The vibes are top-tier, the restaurant is beautiful, the food was fire, and the drinks? Strong and sweet. First time here and they made sure it won‚Äôt be the last‚Äîcoming back very soon <333

Had such a fun time at Cantina Rooftop! The view is amazing, especially around sunset‚Äîdefinitely a great spot to chill with friends or grab drinks after work. The food was really solid (loved the tacos and guac), and the drinks were strong and tasty.

The music and atmosphere made it feel like a mini party without being over the top. Staff was super friendly and on point, which made the whole night even better. Would totally go back‚Äîperfect spot for good food, good vibes, and rooftop views.

El lugar est√° muy lindo, tiene una vista espectacular y la decoraci√≥n tem√°tica mexicana est√° muy bien lograda. Los drinks tambi√©n est√°n s√∫per bien, bien servidos y con buen sabor.

Sin embargo, el DJ arruin√≥ bastante la experiencia: no dejaba una sola canci√≥n completa, cambiaba constantemente y sin ritmo, lo cual hac√≠a dif√≠cil disfrutar el ambiente. Todo lo dem√°s estuvo excelente, pero ojal√° mejoren ese detalle porque realmente desentona con la calidad del resto del lugar.

I can't say to no Mexican food and while I was in NYC, I knew I had to have some! We bumped into this great rooftop place. It has a funky feeling to it while at the same time making you feel like you are in restaurant in Mexico City.

We had some great margaritas and order the asada nachos and the streak and eggs. The nacho were so delicious and the meat portions were very generous! What I liked the most was the beef and egg fajitas! I had never had such plate in a Mexican restaurant. Normally, when I had fajitas it comes with some queso fresco on top. Well, this place took the cheese on a completely different level. The fajitas con arrachera (grilled skirt steak) & huevos come on a bed of melted cheese (I think it was Mozzarella or Oaxaca)! I asked for the steak medium and it came that way.

The stuff were so attentive and took good care of us! The whole place was such a great experience.

If you are in NYC, you won't regret coming to this place! I can't wait to go back!

If you come here for a Saturday morning brunch, expect the music to be so extremely loud you cannot even hear the person next to you and the server to be very inattentive (we were there 3 hours and it easily could have lasted 1.5-2 hours if Andreas had paid more attention to when we actually finished eating each course). I‚Äôve been to other loud brunch places in the city but this one was way more intense and they even have an attendant at the bathroom trying to get tips for giving you soap and paper towel??? So weird. This is basically a tourist trap. Will not return. One good thing is that they were attentive to dietary restrictions.
It is nice colorful with a great view. Food was good drinks were good. People were friendly and nice free shots while u dance. Great experience.

Such a wonderful experience! Great vibes! Friendly Service! Attentive and Michael the manager was fantastic making sure everyone was happy with the service and food! Dj was phenomenal! I couldn‚Äôt stop dancing! Highly recommend!!

I visited Cantina Rooftop during my trip to NYC, and it was a very nice experience. This was my first time trying Mexican food, and the staff were very kind to introduce the dishes to me. I had a brunch set with tacos and a Mimosa, and the food was tasty.

The restaurant has a great atmosphere‚Äîlively, colorful, and comfortable. It is also a good place to stop by before visiting the nearby Intrepid Museum.

I want to thank all the staff for their friendly service. Especially Fulvio, he was very warm and always smiling. He talked to many customers and made sure everyone enjoyed the meal. I really appreciate his kindness.

I recommend this restaurant if you want to enjoy good food and a happy mood.

Had such an amazing experience at Cantina for my anniversary! The rooftop setting was perfect for a night out, and the food was absolutely delicious ‚Äî we had the queso and chips, tacos, and some great drinks. Everything was full of flavor and beautifully presented.

A special highlight was getting to meet Chef Saul, who was incredibly kind and even sent out a gorgeous dessert to celebrate our occasion ‚Äî such a thoughtful touch! The staff were super attentive and friendly throughout the evening. It was a bit loud at times, but honestly, the food and service more than made up for it.

Highly recommend Cantina for a fun night out with incredible food and vibes!
Amazing Time with Cantina Rooftop! We had a blast! Our first time here for a bachelorette and the employees were very attentive. 100% highly recommended! Michael made us feel at home.

Went here for the taco Tuesday deal with my friends (5 women) and it was very much worth the price.
To begin they give you the first 6 tacos on the menu for everyone to try, so we started off with 30 tacos‚Ä¶ while I did appreciate the gesture it did feel kind of wasteful because there were meats that we didn‚Äôt eat. I‚Äôd never been there so I didn‚Äôt know this is how they do it but just something to keep in mind. They also put hot sauce on all of them so just be sure to ask for it on the side if heat isn‚Äôt your friend.
We went on a particularly humid day and the fans didn‚Äôt reach us. So just come ready, bring a small fan if you have one so you can really enjoy.
Drinks were nice and strong.
Best tacos: fish, chicken, birria

üåÆüçπ 10/10 Taco Tuesday Vibes!
F√ºr 25$ so viele Tacos, bis der Knopf an der Jeans aufgibt ‚Äì und f√ºr weitere 25$ ein ganzes Frozen Margarita Brett! Unschlagbar. Nach der dritten Runde Tacos spannt der Bauch, aber die Margaritas machen einen so gl√ºcklich, dass man‚Äôs nicht mehr merkt. üòÖ Perfekte Kombi aus Food-Koma und Urlaubsfeeling ‚Äì absolute Empfehlung! Gr√º√üe üá©üá™üá©üá™üá©üá™
Amazing experience!!! Tacos were incredible from carnitas, to chicken and queso to the margaritas‚Ä¶ definitely recommend :) a big shoutout to Michael as well

09/15/25: I‚Äôm making this review as I‚Äôm siting her drinking a flight of margaritas which  were amazing!!! Especially the tamarind and passion fruit. The manager Michael felt like apart of our friend group. Our server Elvis 10 out of 10!!!!!!
But the star of the show was the street corn‚Ä¶. It was like an orgy if angels in my mouth! I had to take a to go of corn in my mouth

Service was good, food came quick. All the servers were very nice! The music was lacking a bit but it had its good parts. It‚Äôs worth giving a try! Might come back to try them again! The disappointing part was not being able to do the bottomless brunch even though we made it in time but oh well. Our server was Adalberto & he was very nice & welcoming.

We had Brianna as our server, she made my birthday experience so special. We had never been here before, but I will definitely return and with my friends for their next birthday celebrations. The food was delicious.  Brianna was attentive to all the needs that we had!

I have been here twice in the summer time and have to say that this place comes off more as a party restaurant than ‚Äúfine dining‚Äù. Yes the chef is famous and has been featured on many cool cooking shows and awards, but this food and place feels quite commercial then authentic mexican. The pros of this place is the cool decor, clean bathrooms, frequent and fast service, and a large menu with specials for brunch and taco Tuesday as well. You will also appreciate the nice umbrellas and view of the city where you see the W hotel.  The cons are that it feels freakin hot on the outdoor rooftop, and the food felt rather bland. I do appreciate the chips and salsa basket but the freshly made guac could use more salt and tajin/lime seasoning. Then the pork belly soft tacos I ordered were also missing something, I couldn‚Äôt put my finger on it. Perhaps the pork felt dry to me. I would of expected some mexican hot sauces or condiments to automatically be on the table but that wasn‚Äôt offered . The margaritas here are not cheap but strong and the spicy margs have the perfect amount of jalapeno in it. I also appreciate their michelada shot menu and mexican beer selection is good too, cant go wrong with their modelos. This place frequently had birthdays being celebrated with funny lap dances and masked employees, totally reminded me of nacho libre. The dj was also playing music during dinner making it hard to talk but it does turn into a club at night so they do a decent job at keeping the crowd hyped throughout the evening and making birthdays feel special (their shot glasses are very flashy with a sparkler). You will also notice their party halp next door does interesting events like mariachi shows and bull riding shows. That‚Äôs still not in their main restaurant though. In general the portions are good but the place is pricey since they automatically add 18 percent tip and charge a credit card fee. I know the waitress was so nice and knew the menu and specials well but for a party of two i was surprised. I am more tempted to come back here to try dining specials to see difference in price. We spent at least $150 for two people and didnt order much.

Went to Cantina Rooftop for Taco Tuesday, and honestly, it was disappointing.

We had a reservation for 3 at 8:30 PM but weren‚Äôt seated until close to 9 PM. What‚Äôs the point of having a reservation system if you‚Äôre going to make guests wait 15-30 minutes after their scheduled time? I had to go up and ask twice why we hadn‚Äôt been seated, especially when I saw people who arrived after us getting tables. Eventually, the manager stepped in and got us seated after hearing how long we‚Äôd been waiting.

Unfortunately, the service didn‚Äôt get any better from there. After finishing our first round of tacos, we placed a second order‚Ä¶ and then waited. And waited. After 30 minutes with no food and no updates, our waitress came by to clear the table. I mentioned we were still waiting on our order, and she casually said, ‚ÄúIt‚Äôs almost here,‚Äù but also mentioned they were backed up with other tables. A few minutes later, the manager walked by and told me to ‚ÄúTalk to me.‚Äù I explained we‚Äôd been waiting over 30 minutes, and another 10-20 minutes after that, he finally brought out HALF of what we ordered (a random mix of tacos) and some fries ‚Äúon the house.‚Äù

Then an older man came over and gave us one of the strangest excuses I‚Äôve ever heard at a restaurant. He said they canceled our order (without telling us) because we had ordered ‚Äútoo much‚Äù and they thought we wouldn‚Äôt be able to finish it. For the record, we had already finished everything we ordered before, so that assumption was completely wrong. And even if they had concerns, they could‚Äôve just told us‚Äînot silently canceled our order and made us wait around wondering what was going on.

To top it all off, when we got the bill, there was an automatic 20% gratuity added. After all that waiting and terrible service, they definitely didn‚Äôt earn that. We recalculated it and left 10%, which honestly felt generous considering the experience. Meanwhile, our waitress was more focused on socializing with another table, even taking sips of their drinks and asking them, ‚ÄúIs it OK if I drink this?‚Äù‚Äîincredibly unprofessional.

The place seemed completely understaffed for their Taco Tuesday deal. The whole night felt chaotic, disorganized, and frustrating.

The only positive: they‚Äôre generous with the meat on their tacos. But is it worth the wait and the hassle? In my opinion, no.

The place is nice for large groups and celebrations. There were a lot of tables having parties.

While this is a rooftop there are zero views. All the surrounding buildings are way taller. The rooftop is the 4th floor. So don't go here if you are expyNYC rooftop views.

The food is good but nothing out of the ordinary. I had the Fajita steak and it was average. The melted cheese had burnt and hardened at the base of the platter.

The vibe and DJ and music was great.

The service sadly left a lot to be desired.

First at the bar when I was waiting for my group to arrive I ordered a beer. And was surprised that they added an auto-gratuity to the bill.

Then our good order was taken and the food came but after that we never saw our server. After food was cleared no one came to ask if we wanted dessert. It took us 20 minutes and a whole lot of hand waving to get someone's attention to get our check. It was not like there were no servers. They either would not make eye contact or those that did would look through you.

In the end it did seem a tourist trap and probably we should have gone somewhere else. I would not repeat.

Catina Rooftop has a strange familiarity to it.

A fun, well encapsulated atmosphere that can be enjoyed no matter the weather even thought it is in fact on top of a building. The greenhouse surrounds can open to expose the outside world but also can be closed to ensure the party doesn't end no matter time of year.

The food was fantastic, honestly better then you'd expect, especially for the price. The drinks just as great.

The staff was fun, they obviously enjoy themselves. Music choice was excletic, the DJ obviously has an awesomely wide array of music voices and know how to mix it.

I don't remember ever having to wait. Not for a table, nor an order, nor a drink.

Over all just a electric atmosphere.

Cantina Rooftop is such a vibe! The atmosphere is amazing with good music and a fun, lively crowd, definitely a perfect brunch spot. I had the chicken tacos (so good!) while my best friend went for the French toast, and of course we had mimosas. They actually serve them in a bottle, which is cool, but just a tip: drink fast or ask for a cup with ice so it doesn‚Äôt get warm too quick.

The highlight for me? The fire churros with the tres leches dipping sauce‚Ä¶omg, that sauce was to die for. I would love the recipe! üòç Entertainment keeps things fun with staff walking around being silly, and the rooftop cover means even if it rains, you‚Äôre still comfortable.

One thing to note: they‚Äôll take your photo, print it, and try to sell it to you. Cute, but you can always snap your own pics too. Overall, it‚Äôs an amazing spot for brunch, vibes, and good eats. Definitely recommend!

Wonderful time with my friends. Loved the Baja Tacos and the server was very attentive. The guac and chips are worth it to share with friends. It‚Äôs hard to find places that give a real Mexican/LA vibe but this place is a winner. Thank Michael for taking the time to chat with us and tell us more about this place.

Such a cute little restaurant located in the top floor of a building in Hudson yard. You go up using an elevator on the side of the building, and upstairs has lots of seating with cover from the sun and rain if needed. The food was great, we got humo guacamole with chips, the chicken tacos and birria tacos. Along with two drinks, a Pina colada and la dama. The first was very boozy and yummy, and mine was okay, I recommend the Pina colada.

They do brunch events on the weekend and have a big taco for $80 on Mondays to destroy as a family (or as a couple üëÄ).
Service was a bit slow getting the check because our server disappeared when we finished, and we were in a bit of a rush to go at that point.

AMAZING!! Andres gave excellent service but Rafael brought the energyyyy! Honestly, the whole staff was energetic and made the evening so fun! Expect real, authentic Mexican food, classic Spanish dance music (including salsa, reggaeton, and rap) and fun vibes!
Recently visited this taco spot and wow‚Ä¶ flavor overload! üåÆüî• Fresh tortillas, juicy fillings, and salsas 10/10 would come back for another round! Michael a very nice host

This place was such a vibe and the DJ was fireüî•üî•. Our service Fuvio was also amazing and very kind and helpful. The food was good but could be better, chocolate lava cake dessert does not have lava Lol üò≠ . But overall it was a fun experience.
This place is absolutely amazing! The music is kicking, the margaritas are fabulous, one margarita and you are feeling happy! That doesn‚Äôt even include the food!

Great atmosphere, friendly and helpful staff.  The venue is Wheelchair accessible, and we received every accommodation requested.  Including storing a wheelchair and adjusting climate control. Food and drinks are great üëç

Micheal is very welcoming and very nice and funny. Micheal came to our table and greeted us. Food is amazing!! Dj plays great music non stop!!! And the server walks around and asks if anything else is needed. Will be coming again and will recommend!!!! 5 stars and plus !!

7/19/25 - would I come back? No

Food - was mediocre at best, all my family members agreed the food was not the reason people come back here, had better Birria tacos, quesadillas, nachos, & pork was too oily, the meat on the other dishes wasn‚Äôt as flavorful, the cheese on the steak quesadilla was‚Ä¶ different? and the shell for the tacos were too soft for our liking, overall the food just wasn‚Äôt hitting.

The drinks were too strong for my cousin, girlfriend and I, however the rest of my family seem to enjoy their drinks, so with that being said, to each they own!

Service - was decent‚Ä¶..that‚Äôs it

Atmosphere - was better than the food and service tbh, loved that they had ppl coming in different costumes and dancing. And their ‚Äúrooftop‚Äù seem more of a big balcony rather than an actual rooftop, was a bit disappointing.
Great food. Awesome service! And even better music!!!! Such a great time. Thank you to team, Rafael, Carolina and Michael. Highly recommend!!!

Finally some good Mexican food in NYC! The birria is the best I have had in NYC - but not saying it was amazing.  The flavor could have been stronger.  The arroz con mariscos was actually Italian risotto.  Not mexican!  The guacamole ü•ë portion is tiny!The chicken enchiladas were good.  The house salsa was extra hot and I loved it! This level of spice showed that they are not playing! But this place is LOUD! Not my scene! I wasn't looking for a nightclub experience .

First time in New York & had to try this spot! DJ was on point as soon as we walked in. Super nice staff was able to get a table last minute to see the sunset. La Bichota Margarita bomb ‚ô•Ô∏è Will come again!
Michael was very helpful!!! Great food, flautas were very amazing and the guacamole was so delicious especially with the pomegranate and mangoes in it!!!

Celebrating sister‚Äôs birthday and service and attention was just exceptional, starting from the hostess, Michael, up to our server. Arrived without a reservation for three people and got seated right away. Fast service and great atmosphere. Definitely coming back very soon!!

Disappointing.
We went of a Tuesday, tacos were mid, music was too loud and service wasn't great. An order of tacos never arrived. We constantly had the sensation of not being welcome due to the all you can eat formula.
The check had an automatic gratuity of 20% which is definitely too high for the service we received. And we weren't even a big group, only 2 people.
New York is full of amazing restaurants, you can definitely skip this one, you won't regret it.
